mapper.select: select b.id as id, b.title as title, b.content as content, b.written_date as written_date, b.viewCount as viewCount, b.imgs as imgs, u.id as userId, u.nickname as nickname, u.src_photo as src_photo, u.email as email, p.budget as budget, p.limit_to as limit_to, p.current_to as current_to, p.duration as duration, p.location as location from board as b inner join packageboard as p on b.id = p.id inner join user as u on b.userId = u.id where b.id = #{boardId};
